title: The Wall Street Journal: U.S. wins historic cross-country gold at Winter Olympics
text:
PYEONGCHANG, South Korea—Kikkan Randall screamed at the Alpensia Cross Country Centre’s finish line here as Jessie Diggins, her teammate on the two-woman sprint relay, ricocheted off the final turn for home. The Americans found themselves in an unusual position: racing the powerhouse Norwegians and Swedes for gold over the final meters.
It was close, really close. As soon as Diggins crossed the line, Randall looked to the scoreboard and saw something never before seen at an Olympic cross-country race: USA, first place.
...
